message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $15,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
